## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm interested in trying out Verus for myself. Where can I download the Verus software?

**AI Assistant:**
You can download the Verus software from the official Verus website: https://veruscoin.io/#download. Make sure to only download from the official website to ensure you're getting the genuine software.

**User:**
I've downloaded the software. What should I do with it now?

**AI Assistant:**
Once you've downloaded the Verus software, you should unzip the compressed folder to a location on your computer where you can easily launch it from, such as your Desktop. It's a good idea to rename the folder to "Verus v<x>" where "<x>" is the current version, so you can keep track of which version you're running. This will help you stay organized and ensure you're always using the latest version.

**User:**
Okay, I've unzipped the folder. How do I launch the Verus wallet software?

**AI Assistant:**
To launch the Verus wallet software, locate the Agama app within the unzipped folder and launch it. On the first screen, select VRSC from the drop-down menu under "Lite (SPV) Mode" and then choose "Create new wallet". This will get you started with creating your own Verus wallet.
